name: Dark Forest
description: Find your way out of a primeval forest.

locations.name: Middle of the Forest
locations.description: You wake up in a thick forest. You have no idea how you got there.  Maybe try finding your way out? The sun is up and barely visible so you can at least determine which way is north. A rough path leads west. The forest seems thicker to the south and a little thinner north.

locations.name: Dense Forest
locations.description: The forest is dense here and a little darker. You see some mushrooms here.

locations.name: Dense Forest with Thick Bramble
locations.description: The forest is dense here. To the south lies an impassible bramble. You notice foot prints in the dirt.

locations.name: Dense Forest with Thick Bramble
locations.description: The forest is dense here but somehow seems a little less dark. To the south lies an impassible bramble. You hear some gentle birds singing.

locations.name: The Road Out
locations.description: You have found your way out of the forest! There is a road here. You are sure that if you follow the road you will reach civilization or find a traveler to help you.
